text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host.
Welcome to our Phonics show
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet.
Isn’t that cool? They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
Let’s welcome Miss N
Na na na, I am Miss n when you count from 1 to 10
They are na na na numbers that begin with an N

With a nice big syringe in her purse
‘Here comes a sweet little nurse
Na na na nurse Na na na nurse
I like a certain shade of blue I am sure you do too
With that I paint my nails Na na na nails. Na na nails.
See that little bird Singing the sweetest song I ‘ave heard
It is busy building a nest
na na nest, na na nest.

Every morning, with my cup of tea
Do you know what I love to see?

Stories and pictures, in the newspaper
 Na na newspaper, na na newspaper.
When you kick a football Or throw a basketball
To score a point, you hit the net
Na na net, na net.
Are those flowers that I smell? Roses and lilies I can tell,
I can smell them with my strong little nose
Na na nose, na na nose.
When you don’t want to forget Things that can make you fret
You can make a little note
Na na note, na na note.
I have a squirrel as a pet, he hates going to the vet
Acorns are his favourite nut
Na na nuts, na na nuts.
Judges can we have the score..
Nice!
Neat!
Noble!
Novel!
Natural!
Thank you Miss N and judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet
Till then Adios !
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
